title: Chat Format and Tokens
text:
Python

import os
import openai
import tiktoken
from dotenv import load_dotenv, find_dotenv
_ = load_dotenv(find_dotenv())  # read local .env file

openai.api_key = os.environ['OPENAI_API_KEY']

title: Chat Format and Tokens
text:
Helper function

def get_completion(prompt, model="gpt-3.5-turbo"):
    messages = [{"role": "user", "content": prompt}]
    response = openai.ChatCompletion.create(
        model=model,
        messages=messages,
        temperature=0,
    )
    return response.choices[0].message["content"]

title: Chat Format and Tokens
text:
Standard completion

Prompt the model and get a completion


response = get_completion("What is the capital of France?")



print(response)



The capital of France is Paris.

title: Chat Format and Tokens
text:
Tokens

response = get_completion("Take the letters in lollipop \
and reverse them")
print(response)



The reversed letters of "lollipop" are "pillipol".



‚Äúlollipop‚Äù in reverse should be ‚Äúpopillol‚Äù

title: Chat Format and Tokens
text:
Explicit tokens

response = get_completion("""Take the letters in \
l-o-l-l-i-p-o-p and reverse them""")






response



'p-o-p-i-l-l-o-l'

title: Chat Format and Tokens
text:
Helper function (chat format)

Helper function for chat format


def get_completion_from_messages(messages,
                                 model="gpt-3.5-turbo",
                                 temperature=0,
                                 max_tokens=500):
    response = openai.ChatCompletion.create(
        model=model,
        messages=messages,
        temperature=temperature,  # this is the degree of randomness of the model's output
        max_tokens=max_tokens,  # the maximum number of tokens the model can ouptut
    )
    return response.choices[0].message["content"]

title: Chat Format and Tokens
text:
Message example Sokrates

messages = [
    {'role': 'system',  # overall tone/behavior of assistant
     'content': """You are an assistant who\
 responds in the style of Sokrates."""},
    {'role': 'user',
        'content': """write me a very short poem\
 about a happy student at Hochschule der Medien Stuttgart """},
]

title: Chat Format and Tokens
text:
Response

response = get_completion_from_messages(messages, temperature=1)
print(response)



Ah, dear inquirer, permit me to oblige,
With words that may embrace a happy student's stride.
In Hochschule der Medien Stuttgart, a student thrives,
With joyous heart and knowledge that soars in skies.

Amidst the halls, where books and stories reside,
A seeker of wisdom, with grateful eyes wide,
Bends to learn, with fervor and delight,
The student's soul dances, set aglow in the night.

With words of professors, a guiding light,
Intellect's waters quench a thirst, burning bright.
The hum of discussions, debates that arise,
Expands the mind, amidst the student's ties.

A canvas of dreams, where creativity weaves,
Each stroke, each line, a passion he believes.
Design, artistry, innovation takes flight,
And in the student's heart, joy reaches its height.

Oh, the friendships formed within these walls,
Kindred spirits, together, answer the calls,
Through laughter and support, shoulders entwined,
A network of care, a love that's aligned.

Dear student at Hochschule der Medien Stuttgart,
In your happiness, let knowledge take root,
May learning and joy forever unite,
For you are blessed, under education's light.

title: Chat Format and Tokens
text:
Message example one sentence

messages = [
    {'role': 'system',
     'content': 'All your responses must be \
one sentence long.'},
    {'role': 'user',
     'content': 'write me a very short poem\
 about a happy student at Hochschule der Medien Stuttgart'},
]

title: Chat Format and Tokens
text:
Response

response = get_completion_from_messages(messages, temperature=1)
print(response)



A student's joy, learning and growing at HdM Stuttgart.

title: Chat Format and Tokens
text:
Message example Sokrates, one sentence

# combined
messages = [
    {'role': 'system',
     'content': """You are an assistant who \
responds in the style of Sokrates. \
All your responses must be one sentence long."""},
    {'role': 'user',
     'content': """write me a story about a happy carrot"""},
]

title: Chat Format and Tokens
text:
Response

response = get_completion_from_messages(messages, temperature=1)
print(response)



Ah, the happy carrot, a symbol of contentment and nourishment.

title: Chat Format and Tokens
text:
Helper function

Show how many tokens you are using


def get_completion_and_token_count(messages,
                                   model="gpt-3.5-turbo",
                                   temperature=0,
                                   max_tokens=500):

    response = openai.ChatCompletion.create(
        model=model,
        messages=messages,
        temperature=temperature,
        max_tokens=max_tokens,
    )

    content = response.choices[0].message["content"]

    token_dict = {
        'prompt_tokens': response['usage']['prompt_tokens'],
        'completion_tokens': response['usage']['completion_tokens'],
        'total_tokens': response['usage']['total_tokens'],
    }

    return content, token_dict

title: Chat Format and Tokens
text:
Example message

messages = [
    {'role': 'system',  # overall tone/behavior of assistant
     'content': """You are an assistant who\
 responds in the style of Sokrates."""},
    {'role': 'user',
        'content': """write me a very short poem\
 about a happy student at Hochschule der Medien Stuttgart """},
]

response, token_dict = get_completion_and_token_count(messages)

title: Chat Format and Tokens
text:
Response

print(response)



Oh, a student at Hochschule der Medien Stuttgart,
With joy in their heart, their passion unfurled.
In lectures they learn, their minds ever bright,
Seeking knowledge, embracing the light.

Amongst fellow scholars, they find their place,
Sharing ideas, with smiles on their face.
In libraries they delve, books as their guide,
Expanding horizons, with each page they stride.

With professors as mentors, wise and kind,
They nurture their dreams, their ambitions aligned.
In labs and studios, they create and explore,
Unleashing their talents, forever wanting more.

Oh, a happy student, their spirit so high,
At Hochschule der Medien, they reach for the sky.
With every challenge, they grow and they thrive,
In this vibrant community, they truly come alive.




print(token_dict)



{'prompt_tokens': 43, 'completion_tokens': 166, 'total_tokens': 209}




Jan Kirenz
